attributes.action: take the strongest possible measures against men who attack their ex-partners because they are unable to accept the ending of the relationship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Almost every day I read reports in the paper about men who attack - and often even KILL! - their ex-partners; they seem to regard these women as their personal property who have no right to end the relationship or to have a life apart from the men concerned.  It's WELL PAST TIME for these men to realise that all women are people in our own right with absolute autonomy over our lives including decisons on continuing or ending relationships; WE ARE NOT THE PROPERTY OF MEN!
